thread.title: New Poll Finds Majority of Europeans Want Muslim Refugee Migration to End
thread.title_full: New Poll Finds Majority of Europeans Want Muslim Refugee Migration to End

author: K. Campbell
title: New Poll Finds Majority of Europeans Want Muslim Refugee Migration to End
text: New Polls Horrify Dems… Days of Bashing Trump’s Ban Actually Helped It Trump’s 90-day immigration ban included migrants and refugees from Iran, Iraq, Libya, Somalia, Sudan, Syria and Yemen — all predominantly Muslim countries, although the extremist beliefs that have brainwashed many people in these countries and caused intense fighting, not the religion itself, were the reason behind the policy. In the international survey, more than 10,000 respondents from 10 European countries were asked whether “further migration from mainly Muslim countries should be stopped.” The results were telling. Advertisement - story continues below In Poland, a whopping 71 percent of those polled said they opposed more migrants arriving from mostly- Muslim countries, while 65 percent of Austrian participants agreed. Fifty-three percent of Germans who participated in the survey were in favor of banning immigrants from those countries, along with 47 percent of those polled in Great Britain. Overall, only 20 percent of participants disagreed with stopping immigration from the Muslim-majority countries, while 25 percent said they had no opinion on the issue. Researchers called the results “striking and sobering.” Advertisement - story continues below
